Phn mm con cung cp nhng phu tr giup ban co kt qua tt nht trong cac ky thi TOEIC:  + Ng phap trong thi TOEIC: Tng hp nhng bai ng phap chon loc,c cc cac bai tp luyn ng phap, cach tranh sai sot v ng phap trong thi TOEIC  + B 600 t vng thit yu trong luyn thi TOEIC, bn s c hc cc t vng c bin son k cng, mi t vng c m thanh, v d y . V hc t vng vi phng php hc t vng thng minh, vui, d nh, khng nhm chn  + Cac tip va kinh nghim trong lam bai thi TOEIC  + Cc phn bi ging v l trnh luyn thi TOEIC theo cc level mc tiu c th   Vi nhng muc ich Learn English thi phn mm cung giup ich rt nhiu cho cac ban learn english. Mi level trong n luyn thi TOEIC - thi th TOEIC bao gm cc phn sau: - Part 1: Photo - Part II: Question - Response - Part III: Short Conversation - Part IV: Short Talks - Part V: Incomplete Sentences - Part VI: Text Completion - Part VII: Comprehension  Mt ng dng Learn English khng th b qua, mi bn tai v dng th.  Chng ti rt mong nhn c nhng gp ,  tng ca cc bn v phn mm Learn english ny. Chng ti s ngy cng hon thin n  phc v vic Learn english cho ngi Vit c ngy cng tt hn.  Chc cc bn hc ting anh tht tt, co kt qua thi TOEIC tt nht vi phn mm Learn english ny.  TOEIC is a registered trademark of Educational Testing Service (ETS) in the United States and other countries. This app is not endorsed or approved by ETS. TOEIC test preparation - TOEIC test exam is a completely free application. Vietnams leading TOEIC exam preparation software. Help you achieve the highest score in the TOEIC exam   The tests in TOEIC test preparation - TOEIC test have a full explanation, grammatical and vocabulary reasons why right and wrong   Practice TOEIC with TOEIC Preparation - TOEIC Test you can choose the exam preparation level according to your goals. TOEIC test preparation TOEIC test fully supports all levels from basic to advanced including: - Level 250 - 500 - Level 500 - 750 - Level 750 - 990   TOEIC test preparation - TOEIC test prep supports the practice of tests similar to the actual TOEIC test, including: - Mini Test: The TOEIC test is similar to the actual one but halves the number of questions - Skill Test: Test according to the skills in the TOEIC test - Full Test: Simulate identical test questions and practice on the TOEIC test. Available on TOEIC test preparation - TOEIC test exam   TOEIC test preparation - TOEIC test exam includes all parts, from theory to practice, in great detail. The number of questions is diverse, richest and most complete today.   TOEIC test preparation - TOEIC test preparation You can use the software offline by downloading the resource sets of the previous lesson   The questions and exercises in TOEIC test preparation - TOEIC test are divided into separate topics, each topic only has a certain number of English questions to help you become less boring. when studying   TOEIC test preparation - TOEIC test exam has a huge number of lessons, helping you practice as much as you want   In addition to the TOEIC tests. The software also provides aids to help you get the best results on the TOEIC exams:  + Grammar in TOEIC exam: Combining selected grammar lessons, grammar exercises, ways to avoid grammatical errors in TOEIC test  + Set of 600 essential vocabulary for TOEIC exam preparation, you will learn the vocabulary is carefully composed, each word has sound, complete examples. And learn vocabulary with the method of learning vocabulary smart, funny, easy to remember, not boring  + Tips and experience in taking the TOEIC test  + Lectures and TOEIC exam preparation schedule according to specific target levels   For the purpose of Learn English, the software also helps a lot for you to learn english. Help you increase your skills on phap, tu vung, listening ....  Each level in TOEIC test preparation - TOEIC test exam includes the following sections: - Part 1: Photo - Part II: Question - Response - Part III: Short Conversation - Part IV: Short Talks - Part V: Incomplete Sentences - Part VI: Text Completion - Part VII: Comprehension  A Learn English application not to be missed, please download to try.  We are looking forward to your comments and ideas about this English Learn software. We will improve it more and more to better serve Learn English for Vietnamese people.  Wish you good English learning, have the best TOEIC test results with this Learn English software.
